name: Don't go in the water / Stay on dry land
name_original: Don't go in the water / Stay on dry land
description:
There's no swimming at NT beaches! Keep out of the water to stay alive.

Knock your opponents off dry land using your attacks

Left click to attack, arrow keys for movement, up to jump.  Build up damage by dealing multiple hits. 

Choose a character:

Each character is based on an Australian animal that can live in both wet and dry conditions

Left click to select your character, Right click to set the AI opponent.

Each character is assigned to one letter of the word "Wet" or "Dry" on the main menu.

Your character is highlighted in red. The opponent is blue. 

-----------

Experimental features

Multiplayer (availability depends on Peer.JS for establishing a p2p connection)

-play against your peers with online multiplayer

-multiple players can fight for king-of-the-hill

Mobile (touch screen controls may be quirky due to the way itch hosts the game)

-Use the on-screen joystick to fight in mobile

-Tap the right-hand side of the screen to attack

-----------

If you've read this far, be sure to check out the devlog for some more details on how this game was made over the past 3 weeks:

https://stales.itch.io/dont-go-in-the-water-stay-on-dry-land/devlog
